sentences.en: A panic comes over me as I grasp the doorknob.
sentences.cn: 我伸手在墙上摸匙孔,握住门把手时总会慌乱一阵.

sentences.en: All most all hotels provide signs that the guest can hang on the doorknob.
sentences.cn: 几乎所有的旅馆都备有可以挂在房门把手的小牌供顾客使用.

sentences.en: All right, then the fingerprints I lifted from the doorknob in the apartment won't match yours?
sentences.cn: 好吧, 那我在公寓的门把手上取到的指纹不会和你的相符 吧 ?

sentences.en: Another one turned the doorknob but it was locked.
sentences.cn: 另一个扭了一下门把手但它是锁住的。

sentences.en: Doorknob: Sorry, you're much too big. Simply impassible.
sentences.cn: 门把手: 抱歉, 你太大了. 很明显过不去.

sentences.en: Doorknob: Well , one good turn deserves another! What can I do for you?
sentences.cn: 门把手: 另外一边的锁才打的开. 我可以帮你什么忙 呢 ?

sentences.en: Happiness is being able to reach the doorknob.
sentences.cn: 幸福意味着可以够到门把手.
他使劲地晃动门把手，响声很大。

sentences.en: He was sitting fixed , chilled, when the doorknob turned.
sentences.cn: 门把拧开时,他正干坐着, 浑身觉得冷.

sentences.en: I tried the doorknob and it turned.
sentences.cn: 我试了试门把手，结果它转动了。

sentences.en: I watch my gloved hand twisting the doorknob.
sentences.cn: 我看着自己戴着手套的手拧开门把手.

sentences.en: Keep it sad around here for Tommy’s sake,” he said, and went back to the lobby, where he pulled the doorknob from the wall.
sentences.cn: 为了汤米，先在这儿假装一下伤心的样子，”他说完，回到营业室那里，把门把手从墙里拔了出来。

sentences.en: My left hand brushed the wall and found the doorknob.
sentences.cn: 我的左手顺着墙摸过去就找到了门的把手.

sentences.en: Really, a user experience designer could help to improve a person’s experience with just about anything —a doorknob, a faucet, a shopping cart.
sentences.cn: 诚然，用户体验设计师可以帮助人们提高几乎关于任何事物——一个门把手，一个水龙头，一个购物车——的体验。

sentences.en: String this note on the front doorknob.
sentences.cn: 把这张字条子挂在前门的把手上.

sentences.en: The dog pawed at the doorknob again and again.
sentences.cn: 那只狗一次又一次地抓门把手.

sentences.en: The dog pawed at the doorknob.

trans.tran_en: a round handle that you turn to open a door
